name: NitroClash.io
description:
Objective:

Push the ball into the opponent goal !

Use your nitro boost to bump faster into other players and the ball !

A multiplayer IO game inspired by the famous Rocket League car & sports game !

Challenge other players in 3vs3 games !

Controls:

- Use your mouse to control direction

- Click mouse button to BOOST

- Hold SPACE to BRAKE

- Press C to switch to fullscreen camera

- Press X to center camera on player
